channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NSF announces 4 new Engineering Research Centers focused on biotechnology, manufacturing, robotics and sustainability

item.title: Humpbacks are among animals who manufacture and wield tools

item.title: The disappearing mountains and hungry volcano

item.title: Red and processed meat consumption associated with higher type 2 diabetes risk, study of two million people finds

item.title: Unfrozen layers in dryland permafrost are unexpected source of methane
item.description: Permafrost is permanently frozen soil in the coldest areas of the planet. Although it has trapped organic carbon from the remains of plants and animal...

item.title: New view of North Star reveals spotted surface
item.description: High-resolution images show large spots on the surface of Polaris.

item.title: Fossil hotspots in Africa obscure a more complete picture of human evolution
